parameters.name: NodeConfig
parameters.description: The advanced configuration for the node. The value of this parameter must be a JSON string.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the task node. You can call the [GetTaskInstanceRelation](~~424711~~) operation to query the node ID.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) or [ListUserTenants](~~198074~~) operation to query the tenant ID.
